doc.plot: A FAREWELL TO ARMS:THE DON BECKER STORY 'Death is easy, comedy is hard.' Sir Laurence Olivier Why would a bright, young rising-star comedian suddenly and deliberately amputate his own arms" Acclaimed absurdist playwright, Don Becker analyzes his own 1986 life-changing tragedy for the first time in 'A Farewell to Arms: the Don Becker Story' a film by award-winning documentary filmmaker Robin Beeck.
